website_summaries.verdict: Compact, lightweight, and cost-effective, this wireless earbud set provides hours of taking phone calls or listening to music with amazing stereo sound.
pros: Waterproof and sweat-proof for the gym
If quick charge is needed, 15 minutes in the charging case provides 45 minutes more listening time
Pairs with both iPhones and Android phones
Users like the way they look as much as how snugly they fit
cons: Not as noise-cancelling as some higher cost brands
Some users find they don't work as well for watching videos as listening to music

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 9 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for 9 months and then left ear bud quit working. I made sure it was charged and everything else I tried did not work either. Right ear bud worked as expected. Ear buds tended to fall out on treadmill and fast walking outside. Noise canceling was about 50% bc I could carry on a conversation with both ear buds in place and hear noises around me. For the money it’s a 3 star rating based on ease of pairing and good sound minus all the other not good things. Would not purchase again. Went back to much older and cheaper ear buds.
customer_reviews.author: Markos

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: These headphones do have decent sound quality and I use them frequently between classes to watch movies and whatnot on my laptop. Overall I like them but I do wish the buds were smaller. I find they frequently fall out of my ears which gets irritating. However, I do have rather small ears so perhaps they would be a perfect fit for someone else. Overall I think these are pretty great quality for the price and they do work as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Decent small-footprint headphones for workouts
customer_reviews.text: These are alright - they don't sound great but I never expected them to at the price point. They are a little bigger and heavier than I would have liked, but have worked fine so far as minimal-profile wireless headphones for workouts where I don't want any wires or heavy over-the-ear headphones while I am being active and moving a lot. Pairing with my iPhone X on iOS 12 is fine although tricky at the first try. The batteries seem to not last very long or have shortened capacity over time, but I really like the power bank that came with it which seems to hold plenty of charge for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: X-Sparker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for awhile now and use them mostly when I walk the dogs. The sound quality is excellent! I usually only use one because I want to be able to hear cars approaching, etc. They are quite good at noise cancelling. Easy to use and charge. I sometimes have to push in ear a couple times..they tend to start to come out. Could just be shape of my ear..not sure. But well worth it and I do love them. I would never go back to corded ear buds now!
customer_reviews.author: Boatnone

customer_reviews.title: Lacks consistency
customer_reviews.text: This product would have been great if it was consistent. The first pair I bought were great, it had the controls you would expect like play, pause, play next, play previous, start assistant, call last number depending on how or how many time you press the button. But I lost my first pair and bought another one. The second one, no matter what I did, it would only call the last number I dialed. It ruined my worked out and make me seem like a creep because it kept calling this girl I had just met.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Connection issues
customer_reviews.text: I had lost my old ones and got a new pair. So I brought another set. They were fantastic until I came across to many issues. The left one was acting like it couldn't connect at all, then the right one be started. Now it's always glitching, fast forwarding, pausing on its own or not even connecting. I thought maybe it was the phone; but I recently got a new one and still having the same issue. It's very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Battery Life is careless
customer_reviews.text: Bought this thinking that I would replace a five (5) year old behind the neck Bluetooth device. I am still using that device. The battery life on this makes it impossible to think of it as a Bluetooth device. The range is also garbage to say the least. I have cheaper that do much better. I am going to replace the old with the old in a few. Just thought I should review this now.
customer_reviews.author: The Gaucho

customer_reviews.title: Battery Death
customer_reviews.text: Great product until it stopped working, within a little over a year. I see at least one other person mention a similar issue -- the left earbud just won't charge anymore. It shows in the Bluetooth connection as fully charged, but dies in less than an hour. Otherwise I'd loved it. Nice sound, decent portability. But the battery life really brings it down.
customer_reviews.author: Mostly Honest

customer_reviews.title: Lasted just over 2yrs
customer_reviews.text: Loved these earbuds,used them in the gym 3x a week for just over 2yrs.they paired up to my phone easily and the battery life was excellent. Unfortunately, just after the 2yr mark they started cutting out during use and within a week would not pair to my phone anymore. Maybe the reason these are currently unavailable.
customer_reviews.author: Montana Bob

customer_reviews.title: Not to bad but, needs to be upgraded!
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is crazy low. 2-3 hours max of usage. You have to charge it awhile before you can use it. I like how their is a light where it shows if it’s on or off. And if it’s need to be charged or not. Connecting it to you phone is slow to medium speed depending on connection. Price is reasonable compared to other wireless earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Amber H.

customer_reviews.title: RIP JAN 2018 - NOV 2019
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds were my go to for the last year and a half. They're low profile, great for music, and can be paired individually. Not the best for phone calls. Battery life was decent, 3 hours, I think, and came with great charging case that extended use. Great until just the other day when the right earbud failed to recharge. Not bad, I suppose, for almost 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: RobertG

customer_reviews.title: Needs better volune
customer_reviews.text: Max volume is too low. Charges great. Works well but overall value was just ok. Not a lot of base sound and at max volume you can still hear outside noise. Bluetooth cuts in and out and the range from music device is only about 10'-15'. On calls people can hear all the background noise.
customer_reviews.author: William L. Kirk

customer_reviews.title: left earphone never got a solid bluetooth signal
customer_reviews.text: The skipping signal was quite maddening, I bought this for working out at the gym and it did not make my work outs any fun. I tried everything to stop the broken skipping signal but nothing worked. It finally ended up getting washed in my gym pants where is stuck them and forgot about them out of frustration. Definitely would not recommend getting these.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A Smith

customer_reviews.title: These things are AMAZING, I use them daily
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is great, especially when listening to MUSIC! I'm not sure what the whole "noise cancellation" thing is all about, the background noise is very loud to people on the other end. I wish I could find a pair that wasn't so loud for my listeners (on the other end) but I really do like these!
customer_reviews.author: iflyliljets

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy these at the gym
customer_reviews.text: The main reason I use these is that I don't have to mess with a cord. They are not noise cancelling and they fall out when I get sweaty and bend over or lean over. It also has that annoying low battery message that goes on and one and on.
customer_reviews.author: suz

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Well I purchased these last year. I have only use them twice and went to use them. They don’t work at all and wont even charge. Waste of money. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: pretty one

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for nine months
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these. They did a good job of filtering out my husband’s snoring while playing audiobooks. They stay in my ears. Unfortunately after about nine months of daily use, they are no longer holding a charge.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Almost Love
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for almost a year, I stopped using them for three months, and I have started using them again for about two weeks now. They don't sync anymore and they only last about an hour after I charge them :( sad they where great in the beginning, I guess as long as you use them everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Harris

customer_reviews.title: does not stay in ear
customer_reviews.text: these have good sound and connect very good. but they fall out of your ear easily.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Great Noise Cancellation and Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm only upset these are no longer available for purchase. I love these earbuds. Truly wireless, sound great, cancel noise, look great in the ear. I bought a pair in Feb of 2018 and they're still going strong. I wanted to purchase a second pair to leave at work. Please make them available for purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Regina Shawgo

customer_reviews.title: Great at first
customer_reviews.text: The product started to fail after 6 months. First it, the charging box stopped charging the ear buds. Then the ear buds stopped holding charges to the point that one ear bud would not last long enough to charge the other while it is plugged into the wall.
customer_reviews.author: amazonCustomerA

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: Not designed for active people. Once you start to sweat it will slip off your ears.
customer_reviews.author: Rgar

customer_reviews.title: They broke!!
customer_reviews.text: After two and a half years - they just straight up broke! Won’t charge, nothing. I have used them rarely, and taken rather good care of them. No warranty so I’m also screwed there. Don’t waste your money! While they worked they were very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Quick to charge, quick to go dead. 4 to 6 hours tops!
customer_reviews.author: Shunter4

customer_reviews.title: Usage time after charging deteriorates significantly
customer_reviews.text: Very poor charging life. When I first tried them, they stayed charged for almost an hour. It has deteriorated to around ten minutes. Would not recommend or buy again.
customer_reviews.author: May Y

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: These worked well for the price. There was a lag when watching videos though. Other than that, no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Shiela M

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & great sound
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I do not care for things in my ears but these are pretty comfortable. Lightweight & great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Diana C

customer_reviews.title: Fits nice in my ears and great sound
customer_reviews.text: Charges in about an hour and last about 8 to 10 hours
customer_reviews.author: Mikesr100

customer_reviews.title: Can't hear you
customer_reviews.text: Can't get them to connect to any device. Terrible instructions. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I wish the power could last longer then 3 hours tho
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Nutall

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: They make a constant high pitched ringing while on, they battery life is terrible and one just stopped working!
customer_reviews.author: CEC

customer_reviews.title: garbo
customer_reviews.text: i had these for literally a month an a half and they crapped out
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't able to use them
customer_reviews.text: I could not hear clearly. They didn't pair correctly even when I tried, several times to. I wasn't able to used them.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Roselina Da Silva

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: One of the pods stopped working after only a month of having them. It stopped taking a charge
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Good buds. Wish they lasted longer.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality sound. I would recommend, but 1 stopped working and will no longer charge. I loved them while they were working. I still use the remaining bud.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these 3 years ago and still working good
customer_reviews.author: Venus

customer_reviews.title: Product failed within a week
customer_reviews.text: The product worked for one week and then the right earbud failed to ever charge again leaving the entire device useless since you need both to listen to music. Don’t buy, waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Bradley M.

customer_reviews.title: Worst headphones I’ve came across
customer_reviews.text: Terrible Bluetooth connectivity, loses signal at just a foot away. Bought them, tried using a few times , now they just collect dust awaiting the trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Wright

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought it in March of 2019may 31 of 2019 the charging box will not charge. This is the 2nd time I bought this product. Not very happy. Can’t return time is up.
customer_reviews.author: Crawdad

customer_reviews.title: Stopped pairing
customer_reviews.text: I really like them when I got them and sound good for my taste.but after 8 months of useing the right one it stopped pairing with my devise
customer_reviews.author: david collins

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Pairing with each other.
customer_reviews.text: They worked fine for a while but now they will not pair with each other. They do work individually .
customer_reviews.author: Albert Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Not sure
customer_reviews.text: As I open the box that's what I found so dont k ow what happen
customer_reviews.author: edward a medina

customer_reviews.title: Spectacular
customer_reviews.text: being 62 it I was a little slow activating Bluetooth. Amazing
customer_reviews.author: James M. Orpin

product_meta.title: Wireless Earbuds, Cshidworld Bluetooth 5.0 Headphones Noise Cancelling Mini Headset IPX5 Sweatproof Invisible Sports in Ear Earphones with Built-in Mic for Smartphones Laptop
feature_bullets: 【BLUETOOTH 5.0 & TRUE WIRELESS EARBUDS】 Featuring Bluetooth 5.0 and noise cancellation technology reduces ambient noise and echo, enable clear sound no matter in calls, stealth listening or watching videos at work or in the office. Provides faster pairing, stable connection and signal transmission (33ft no-obstacle range). Easily switched between voice call and music.

【UPGRADED MULTIPOINT CONNECTION & SHARE MODE】Multipoint pairing for use with two devices at the same time and answer calls from either one. Supports both earbuds for phone calls. These earbuds can be also used dual or separately as you wish, which means you can share the same music/movies with friends and enjoy the clear stereo sound by using both headset.

【LONGER BATTERY LIFE WITH STORAGE BOX】Equipped 1000mAh battery in the portable magnetic charging box, which can support 5 times fully charging for the wireless earbuds. Never worry about low battery when you are out all day. And each earphone has Built in 60 mAh lithium polymer battery, enjoy about up to 3 hours of premium quality music playtime and 6 hours talk time after fully charged.

【ANTI-DROP OUT COMFORT DESIGN】 For secure and comfort wear, our wireless earbuds is carefully designed according to ear geometry, 3 different sizes of soft ear cups included for comfort and secure fit. Light weight and sweatproof allowing running, jogging, and high intensity activities to be enjoyable. Say goodbye to earphones cable annoyance.

【RELIABLE QUALITY AND WARRANTY】 IPX5 water-resistance protects the earbuds against rain and sweat. The mini earbuds also passed 1.5m drop test, so you needn’t worry about unexpected drop or shock. Note: We provide 60 DAYS HASSLE-FREE RETURN POLICY and ONE YEAR WARRANTY, your purchase is totally RISK-FREE.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars265 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
